abstract: Hubert H. Humphrey III, the son of the deceased former vice president, will lead the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau's "older Americans" unit.
snippet: Hubert H. Humphrey III, the son of the deceased former vice president, will lead the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau's "older Americans" unit.
lead_paragraph: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has recruited a famous name: Hubert Humphrey.

headline.main: Consumer Unit for Seniors Draws a Famous Name
